## i2cReadDevice() function

This reads count bytes from the raw device.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function i2cReadDevice(handle: number, rxBuf: Uint8Array): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handle


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The I2C device handle as returned by [i2cOpen()](./lgpio.i2copen.md)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

rxBuf


</td><td>

Uint8Array


</td><td>

The buffer to receive the data read from the device


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

The number of bytes read from the device
